scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/tsc -p src/tsconfig.server.json && cp -R src/assets dist && cp -R src/css dist && cp src/firebase-sa.json dist && cp src/services/posts.json dist/services && cp -R src/articles dist/
scripts.build:sw: npm run build:tsc && node build/sw-build && cp build/sw.js public/ && npm run copy_npm
scripts.public: rm -rf public && mkdir public && mkdir public/articles && mkdir public/tags
scripts.compile: yarn public && yarn build && OFFLINE=false COMPILE=true node dist/index.js && cp -R src/assets public
scripts.compile:offline: yarn public && yarn build && OFFLINE=true COMPILE=true node dist/index.js && cp -R src/assets public
